page.title: 20LIFESTYLES IN CHILMARK
page.content: When writing this survey it has not been possible to use the full name of the survey area, CHILMARK AND TEFFONT MAGNA, 26 spaces in all. So in many cases the name Chilmark has been used to include Teffont Magna. Many {apologies}are due to Teffont for this unfortunate arrangement, especially considering old rivalries. {Many thanks}to the parish clerks of both villages, the Headmasters of Chilmark School and Wardour School and to all the other people who have helped by answering questions and making suggestions. ANNE McGRAIL
